Web Design & Development Solutions

About Me

Greetings! My name is Ted and I am a web guru in the NYC Metropolitan area with a passion for building beautiful and functional front-end solutions. At MLB Advanced Media I work as a Logging/Cutting Supervisor to bring livestreaming video content to thousands daily. When I step away from the screen I enjoy golfing, reading, and trekking through the woods to find my Titlest.

Work

Ballpark Weather

A dynamic web app that pulls live weather data from the ballpark locations of upcoming MLB games. The games that are in danger of precipitation, and by extension weather delay, are highlighted.

Development
Design
Open Link
NHL Logger Tools

At MLBAM the NHL Gamenight Loggers have an overwhelming amount of things to keep track of over a three hour broadcast. I built the Logger Tools to alleviate the mental stress put on a logger while using up a minimal amount of screen real estate.

Development
Design
Open Link
Photography

Headshots taken in the West Village (Manhattan) for an aspiring voice actor.

Photography
CJ Sawmill & Lumber

A small wood milling business was looking to attract clients via the web. I assesed their services offered, and designed a four page web site from scratch that displays the process and pricing equipped with a gallery plugin and CMS.

Development
Design

The Art of Illusion
